verses.t: Let{G5015} not{G3361} your{G5216} heart{G3588} be troubled{G5015}: ye believe{G4100} in{G1519} God{G3588}, believe{G4100} also{G2532} in{G1519} me{G1691}.tags 6 and 7 are the same word - πιστευετε tags 14 and 15 are the same word - πιστευετε

In{G1722} my{G3450} Father's{G3588} house{G3588} are{G1526} many{G4183} mansions{G3438}: if{G1487} it were not{G3361} so, I would have told{G2036} you{G5213}. I go{G4198} to prepare{G2090} a place{G5117} for you{G5213}.tag 14

And{G2532} if{G1437} I go{G4198} and{G2532} prepare{G2090} a place{G5117} for you{G5213}, I will come{G2064} again{G3825}, and{G2532} receive{G3880} you{G5209} unto{G4314} myself{G1683}; that{G2443} where{G3699} I{G1473} am{G1510}, there ye{G5210} may be{G5600} also{G2532}.
And{G2532} whither{G3699} I{G1473} go{G5217} ye know{G1492}, and{G2532} the way{G3588} ye know{G1492}.
Thomas{G2381} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Lord{G2962}, we know{G1492} not{G3756} whither{G4226} thou goest{G5217}; and{G2532} how{G4459} can we{G1410} know{G1492} the way{G3588}?

Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, I{G1473} am{G1510} the way{G3588}, the truth{G3588}, and{G2532} the life{G3588}: no man{G3762} cometh{G2064} unto{G4314} the Father{G3588}, but{G3361} by{G1223} me{G1700}.tag 9 tag 20

If{G1487} ye had known{G1097} me{G3165}, ye should have known{G1097} my{G3450} Father{G3588} also{G2532}: and{G2532} from{G575} henceforth{G737} ye know{G1097} him{G846}, and{G2532} have seen{G3708} him{G846}.tag 9
Philip{G5376} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Lord{G2962}, shew{G1166} us{G2254} the Father{G3588}, and{G2532} it sufficeth{G714} us{G2254}.

Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Have I been{G1510} so long{G5118} time{G5550} with{G3326} you{G5216}, and{G2532} yet hast thou{G1097} not{G3756} known{G1097} me{G3165}, Philip{G5376}? he that{G3588} hath seen{G3708} me{G1691} hath seen{G3708} the Father{G3588}; and{G2532} how{G4459} sayest{G3004} thou{G4771} then, Shew{G1166} us{G2254} the Father{G3588}?

Believest thou{G4100} not{G3756} that{G3754} I{G1473} am{G2076} in{G1722} the Father{G3588}, and{G2532} the Father{G3588} in{G1722} me{G1698}the words{G3588} that{G3739} I{G1473} speak{G2980} unto you{G5213} I speak{G2980} not{G3756} of{G575} myself{G1683}: but{G1161} the Father{G3962} that{G3588} dwelleth{G3306} in{G1722} me{G1698}, he{G846} doeth{G4160} the works{G3588}.

Believe{G4100} me{G3427} that{G3754} I{G1473} am in{G1722} the Father{G3588}, and{G2532} the Father{G3588} in{G1722} me{G1698}: or{G1487} else{G1161} believe{G4100} me{G3427} for{G1223} the very works'{G3588} sake{G846}.tag 15 tag 18

Verily{G281}, verily{G281}, I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, He{G4100} that{G3588} believeth{G4100} on{G1519} me{G1691}, the works{G3588} that{G3739} I{G1473} do{G4160} shall he do{G4160} also{G2548}; and{G2532} greater{G3173} works than these{G5130} shall he do{G4160}; because{G3754} I{G1473} go{G4198} unto{G4314} my{G3450} Father{G3588}.tag 5
And{G2532} whatsoever{G302} ye shall ask{G154} in{G1722} my{G3450} name{G3588}, that{G5124} will I do{G4160}, that{G2443} the Father{G3588} may be glorified{G1392} in{G1722} the Son{G3588}.
If{G1437} ye shall ask{G154} any thing{G5100} in{G1722} my{G3450} name{G3588}, I{G1473} will do{G4160} it.
If{G1437} ye love{G25} me{G3165}, keep{G5083} my{G1699} commandments{G3588}.

And{G2532} I{G1473} will pray{G2065} the Father{G3588}, and{G2532} he shall give{G1325} you{G5213} another{G243} Comforter{G3875}, that{G2443} he may abide{G3306} with{G3326} you{G5216} for{G1519} ever{G3588};

Even the Spirit{G3588} of truth{G3588}; whom{G3739} the world{G3588} cannot{G1410} receive{G2983}, because{G3754} it seeth{G2334} him{G846} not{G3756}, neither{G3761} knoweth{G1097} him{G846}: but{G1161} ye{G5210} know{G1097} him{G846}; for{G3754} he dwelleth{G3306} with{G3844} you{G5213}, and{G2532} shall be{G2071} in{G1722} you{G5213}.
I will{G863} not{G3756} leave{G863} you{G5209} comfortless{G3737}: I will come{G2064} to{G4314} you{G5209}.

Yet{G2089} a little while{G3397}, and{G2532} the world{G3588} seeth{G2334} me{G3165} no{G3756} more{G2089}; but{G1161} ye{G5210} see{G2334} me{G3165}: because{G3754} I{G1473} live{G2198}, ye{G5210} shall live{G2198} also{G2532}.
At{G1722} that{G1565} day{G3588} ye{G5210} shall know{G1097} that{G3754} I{G1473} am in{G1722} my{G3450} Father{G3588}, and{G2532} ye{G5210} in{G1722} me{G1698}, and I{G2504} in{G1722} you{G5213}.

He that{G3588} hath{G2192} my{G3450} commandments{G3588}, and{G2532} keepeth{G5083} them{G846}, he{G1565} it is{G2076} that{G3588} loveth{G25} me{G3165}: and{G1161} he that{G3588} loveth{G25} me{G3165} shall be loved{G25} of{G5259} my{G3450} Father{G3588}, and{G2532} I{G1473} will love{G25} him{G846}, and{G2532} will manifest{G1718} myself{G1683} to him{G846}.tags 1,11 and 14

Judas{G2455} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, not{G3756}Iscariot{G3588}, Lord{G2962}, how{G5101} is it{G1096} that{G3754} thou wilt{G3195} manifest{G1718} thyself{G4572} unto us{G2254}, and{G2532} not{G3780} unto the world{G3588}?

Jesus{G3588} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, If{G1437} a man{G5100} love{G25} me{G3165}, he will keep{G5083} my{G3450} words{G3588}: and{G2532} my{G3450} Father{G3588} will love{G25} him{G846}, and{G2532} we will come{G2064} unto{G4314} him{G846}, and{G2532} make{G4160} our abode{G3438} with{G3844} him{G846}.tag 26

He that{G3588} loveth{G25} me{G3165} not{G3361} keepeth{G5083} not{G3756} my{G3450} sayings{G3588}: and{G2532} the word{G3588} which{G3739} ye hear{G191} is{G2076} not{G3756} mine{G1699}, but{G235} the Father's{G3962} which sent{G3992} me{G3165}.tag 1
These things{G5023} have I spoken{G2980} unto you{G5213}, being{G3306} yet present{G3306} with{G3844} you{G5213}.

But{G1161} the Comforter{G3875}, which is the Holy{G40} Ghost{G3588}, whom{G3739} the Father{G3588} will send{G3992} in{G1722} my{G3450} name{G3588}, he{G1565} shall teach{G1321} you{G5209} all things{G3956}, and{G2532} bring{G5279} all things{G3956} to your{G5209} remembrance{G5279}, whatsoever{G3739} I have said{G2036} unto you{G5213}.tags 21 and 22

Peace{G1515} I leave{G863} with you{G5213}, my{G1699} peace{G1515} I give{G1325} unto you{G5213}: not{G3756} as{G2531} the world{G3588} giveth{G1325}, give{G1325} I{G1473} unto you{G5213}. Let{G5015} not{G3361} your{G5216} heart{G3588} be troubled{G5015}, neither{G3366} let it be afraid{G1168}.

Ye have heard{G191} how{G3754} I{G1473} said{G2036} unto you{G5213}, I go away{G5217}, and{G2532} come{G2064} again unto{G4314} you{G5209}. If{G1487} ye loved{G25} me{G3165}, ye would rejoice{G5463}, because{G3754} I said{G2036}, I go{G4198} unto{G4314} the Father{G3588}: for{G3754} my{G3450} Father{G3588} is{G2076} greater{G3187} than I{G3450}.tags 15 and 27
And{G2532} now{G3568} I have told{G2046} you{G5213} before{G4250} it come to pass{G1096}, that{G2443}, when{G3752} it is come to pass{G1096}, ye might believe{G4100}.

Hereafter{G2089} I will{G2980} not{G3756} talk{G2980} much{G4183} with{G3326} you{G5216}: for{G1063} the prince{G758} of this{G5127} world{G3588} cometh{G2064}, and{G2532} hath{G2192} nothing{G3762} in{G1722} me{G1698}.tag 17

But{G235} that{G2443} the world{G3588} may know{G1097} that{G3754} I love{G25} the Father{G3588}; and{G2532} as{G2531} the Father{G3588} gave{G1781} me{G3427} commandment{G1781}, even so{G3779} I do{G4160}. Arise{G1453}, let us go{G71} hence{G1782}.
